HELP_DESC: Writing string for channel to database
SUCCESS: your message successfully saved to database and attached to this channel
READ: messages listening is already enabled for this channel, saving is aborted
USAGE_EXAMPLE_1: Add "hello" message to history of this channel messages
USAGE_EXAMPLE_2: Get content from given paste and save it to history of this channel messages
PASTE_FAIL: failed to get content from given paste
PASTE_LARGE: given text is too large (limit is %limit% characters)
PASTE_COOLDOWN: you can add messages from paste again on %date%
